alert.note: Alert for Atchison; Nodaway (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 07 at 9:23PM CDT until May 07 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Atchison County in northwestern Missouri... Northern Nodaway County in northwestern Missouri... * Until 1000 PM CDT. * At 922 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles east of Clarinda to near Burlington Junction to Shubert, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Tarkio, Rock Port, Fairfax, Burlington Junction, Hopkins, Clearmont, Elmo, Pickering, Westboro, Quitman, Indian Cave State Park and Phelps City. This includes Interstate 29 between mile markers 99 and 112. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
